news_header: Interest subsidies helped maintain 40,000 jobs during the 2020 pandemic.
news_text: According to the Etla Research Institute, interest subsidies were crucial in preserving 40,000 jobs during the first pandemic in 2020. The financing of loan disturbances in Business Finland contributed to this outcome, although it also led to reduced labor productivity. Additionally, aid from the Centre not only maintained employment but positively impacted company productivity. Olli Ropponen, Research Manager at Etla, emphasized that the aid provided at the pandemic's onset played a vital role in job preservation and that the permanent cost support system helped reduce business failures.
